name: Fiery 5-Minute Salmon & Veg Power Stack
step_by_step: Heat non-stick pan on high for 30 sec
Rub salmon with 1 tsp olive oil, minced chili, pinch salt
Sear salmon 1 min per side; remove
Add asparagus & broccoli, toss 1 min with chili flakes
Layer spinach, veg, salmon; sprinkle cheese & crushed peanuts; serve
